title: A. Thesis
stimulusHtml:
1 point

States a thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question. The thesis must do more than restate the question.

0 points

Does not state a thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question or has a thesis that merely restates the question.
descriptions: Does not state a thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question or has a thesis that merely restates the question.
States a thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question. The thesis must do more than restate the question.

title: B. Support for argument
stimulusHtml:
2 points

Supports the stated thesis (or makes a relevant argument) using specific evidence, clearly and consistently stating how the evidence supports the thesis or argument, and establishing clear linkages between the evidence and the thesis or argument.

1 point

Supports the stated thesis (or makes a relevant argument) using specific evidence.

0 points

Response does not use specific evidence to support the stated thesis or a relevant argument.
descriptions: Response does not use specific evidence to support the stated thesis or a relevant argument.
Supports the stated thesis (or makes a relevant argument) using specific evidence.

Supports the stated thesis (or makes a relevant argument) using specific evidence, clearly and consistently stating how the evidence supports the thesis or argument, and establishing clear linkages between the evidence and the thesis or argument.

title: C. Application of targeted historical thinking skill
stimulusHtml:
2 points

Analyzes the extent to which the historical development specified in the prompt was different from AND similar to developments that preceded and/or followed, providing specific examples to illustrate the analysis.

1 point

Describes the ways in which the historical development specified in the prompt was different from OR similar to developments that preceded and/or followed.

0 points

Response does not describe the ways in which the historical development specified in the prompt was different from OR similar to developments that preceded and/or followed.
descriptions: Response does not describe the ways in which the historical development specified in the prompt was different from OR similar to developments that preceded and/or followed.
Describes the ways in which the historical development specified in the prompt was different from OR similar to developments that preceded and/or followed.

Analyzes the extent to which the historical development specified in the prompt was different from AND similar to developments that preceded and/or followed, providing specific examples to illustrate the analysis.

title: D. Synthesis
stimulusHtml:
1 point

Appropriately extends or modifies the stated thesis or argument.

OR

Explicitly employs an additional appropriate category of analysis (e.g., political, economic, social, cultural, geographic, race, gender) beyond that called for in the prompt

OR

Appropriately connects the topic of the question to other historical periods, geographical areas, contexts, or circumstances.

0 points

Response does not synthesize the argument, evidence, and context into a coherent and persuasive essay.
descriptions: Response does not synthesize the argument, evidence, and context into a coherent and persuasive essay.
